Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2015.2.3 (Build 855U)

Parameter.name: PageID
Parameter.Description: 23.06.17 tt; vraci se http 404 kvuli chybejicim zaznamu v OAI set pro NUSL 22.08.13 tt; pridany parametr pretty 29.11.12 tt; zalozena stranka vypis o infomraci o vymazanem zaznamu &op={PageID} cavdeletedrecord

Method.name: preHTTP
Method.Description:
Vola se pri OnPreHTTP metode CSP
vraci retezec pri chybe
Method.Implementation:
s %response.Status="404 Not Found" d %response.SetHeader("Status","404 Not Found")
q ##class(i2.ui.menu).accessPage(..#PageID)
